College of Business Administration
Department of Finance
Business Administration I (BS1), 409

courseSection0.text:
College of Business Administration
Department of Finance
Business Administration I (BS1), 409

p.Restricted to finance majors. These cert: Restricted to finance majors. These certificates do not require additional hours beyond the finance major program. They are intended to allow students to develop specializations in areas of interest. Certificates will be awarded only at the time of degree completion.

li.No course grade lower than a C will be a: No course grade lower than a C will be accepted for the certificate requirements, and the average GPA for the four courses must be 3.0 or higher.
li.An internship must be a paid internship: An internship must be a paid internship with a financial services firm, and must be approved by the Department of Finance Internship coordinator and a banking faculty member.

courseSection0.text:
Restricted to finance majors. These certificates do not require additional hours beyond the finance major program. They are intended to allow students to develop specializations in areas of interest. Certificates will be awarded only at the time of degree completion.
Certificate Admission Requirements
None
Certificate Requirements
No course grade lower than a C will be accepted for the certificate requirements, and the average GPA for the four courses must be 3.0 or higher.
An internship must be a paid internship with a financial services firm, and must be approved by the Department of Finance Internship coordinator and a banking faculty member.
Prerequisite Courses
None

courseSection0.text0:
Complete the following: 
FIN4324 - Commercial Bank Management (3)
ACG3131 - Intermediate Financial Accounting I (3)
ACG3141 - Intermediate Financial Accounting II (3)
courseSection0.text1:
Complete at least 1 of the following: 
MAR3391 - Professional Selling (3)
FIN4941 - Finance Internship (3)
